buildCommand: START_DIR=$PWD; if [ "$(basename "$PWD")" = "backend" ]; then cd ../..; fi && echo '--- DEBUG BUILD ---' && pwd && ls -F node_modules/ | grep react || echo 'react not found in root' && npx turbo run build --filter=frontend --filter=@wallet-pass/shared && rm -rf "$START_DIR/dist" && mkdir -p "$START_DIR/dist" && cp -r apps/frontend/dist/* "$START_DIR/dist/"
installCommand: if [ "$(basename "$PWD")" = "backend" ]; then cd ../..; fi && npm install && echo '--- DEBUG INSTALL ---' && pwd && ls -F node_modules/ | grep react || echo 'react not found in root'
